Event Details

{% raw %}

get_event_date[source]

get_event_date(cz_event_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, cz_draw_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, cz_game_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, **request_kwargs)

Returns the dates of the event based on the cz_event_id or the cz_game_id.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_event_name[source]

get_event_name(cz_event_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, cz_draw_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, cz_game_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, **request_kwargs)

Returns the name of the event based on the cz_event_id or the cz_game_id.

{% endraw %}

Boxscore Details

{% raw %}

get_boxscore[source]

get_boxscore(cz_event_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, cz_draw_id:Optional[int]=None, game_number:Optional[int]=None, cz_game_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, **request_kwargs)

Returns a curling boxscore (dict) based on the cz_event_id, cz_draw_id and game_number or the cz_game_id.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_boxscore_with_game_details[source]

get_boxscore_with_game_details(cz_event_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, cz_draw_id:Optional[int]=None, game_number:Optional[int]=None, cz_game_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, **request_kwargs)

Returns a curling boxscore (dict) with additional event details based on the cz_event_id, cz_draw_id and game_number or the cz_game_id.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_full_boxscore[source]

get_full_boxscore(cz_event_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, cz_draw_id:Optional[int]=None, game_number:Optional[int]=None, cz_game_id:Union[str, int, NoneType]=None, **request_kwargs)

Returns a curling boxscore (dict) with data hash based on the cz_event_id, cz_draw_id and game_number or the cz_game_id. get_full_boxscore limits the number of get_requests that are made to the CurlingZone site.

{% endraw %}
